meanings.definition: The sport or activity of climbing mountains.
meanings.sent1: Mountaineering requires strength and endurance to reach the mountain tops.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy mountaineering as a challenging outdoor activity.
meanings.sent3: The bear tried mountaineering up the steep hill to reach the beehive.
meanings.sent4: Her determination in mountaineering through life's obstacles was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of mountaineering lies in conquering nature's majestic peaks.

meanings.definition: The practice of climbing mountains for sport or recreation.
meanings.sent1: Mountaineering clubs organize trips for enthusiasts to explore new peaks.
meanings.sent2: During the summer, many tourists engage in mountaineering to enjoy the views.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's mountaineering adventure up the snow-covered slope was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, success often requires the same determination as mountaineering.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of mountaineering is unmatched as you stand on the summit, gazing at the world below.
